summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for a specific period in June 2018. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and fees, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is referenced in relation to a money transfer from the account.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is mentioned in connection with a money transfer to her account.

connections.description: Richard Kahn and Bella Klein are connected through a financial transaction involving a transfer of funds.

events.title: Account Activity Begins
events.description: The financial statement begins with account activity starting from June 1, 2018, detailing various transactions.

events.title: Ending Balance Reported
events.description: The statement concludes with the ending balance of the account as of June 30, 2018.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank covering the period from June 1 to June 30, 2018.
The beginning balance on June 1, 2018, was $232,732.38.
The ending balance on June 30, 2018, was $203,108.51.
Multiple preauthorized debits and transfers are detailed, including payments to ADP for payroll and taxes.
There are references to money transfers involving Richard Kahn and Bella Klein.
